title: AI-powered medal predictor re-trained with 2024 data
description: BSIN refreshed the model with Tokyo+Paris combined datasets. Accuracy improved from 82% to 89%.

title: District-level talent scouting now live in 50+ regions
description: Initial release of AI Talent Finder launched for 14 states, revealing Punjab and Karnataka as top hubs.

title: Multilingual dashboard with Bhashini integration launched
description: BSIN now supports Hindi, Tamil, and Bengali dashboards to improve accessibility for state officials.

title: Climate risk module added to BSIN policy engine
description: Helps visualize heat-wave impact on athlete readiness across Indian states for outdoor sports.
